about_the_game:
Emotions of Battle – Retro BGM is an official music pack containing retro-style battle themes inspired by old-school JRPGs to bring out all sorts of emotions in battle!

■ Retro style battle themes!
The battle themes are composed in a manner that they’re named after! Their meanings are often states that occur during the heat of combat.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------
【Specifications】
・.OGG format
・.M4A format
・Looping supported

【6 Battle Themes】

・Endurance
・Excitement
・Grace
・Rage
・Sorrow
・Valour
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

・This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
・OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker
・Rights must be indicated when using assets.
・You may modify some of the assets (but not redistribute them) for your own game use only.
・All copyrights, neighboring rights, and all other rights to this material belong to the creator or a third party authorized by the creator.
